Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.game

Class cardRules

java.lang.Object
org.example.eiscuno.model.game.cardRules
public class cardRules extends Object
Manages the rules and effects of special cards in the Uno game.

This class handles the execution of actions triggered by special cards such as REVERSE, SKIP, +2, and +4.
